column5: I am looking for a good kid friendly place to take my 4 year old fishing.  No boat just off shore or dock etc.  He is just learning to cast so I need somewhere that is not too congested.  I am in the Woodstock area.  If any one has any suggestions that would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks
http://maps.google.ca/maps?hl=en&ie=UT...=16&iwloc=A   I believe there is a $4-5 dollar fee. But its perfect for taking children and your almost guaranteed fish!
